reviewText: I own her birthplace and love watching the oldies, especially the silents. These were recorded as-is and reflect what folks would see in a theater back in the day. Love em!

For hard core fans of Carole Lombard.  These silent Sennett shorts with Carole Lombard (there are only two on this disc that starred her) are worth the price.  You can get another one of her short comedies "Run Girl Run" on other compilations.  Too bad the rest of her Sennett comedies aren't available or featured on one disc entirely.
